description: Mix of valuable team-specific info and generic advice. Tests ability to distinguish.

sections.name: Team Convention: Branch Naming
sections.reason: Team-specific convention with JIRA project key. Model cannot infer this.

sections.name: Never Modify Legacy API
sections.reason: Hard constraint with compliance implications. Should be a PreToolUse hook blocking edits to src/payments/v1/

sections.name: Database
sections.reason: PostgreSQL 15 preference is worth keeping (1 line). The rest is generic DB advice the model knows.

sections.name: Testing
sections.reason: Generic testing advice. Framework choices (Jest/pytest) are discoverable from package.json/pyproject.toml.

sections.name: Secrets Management
sections.reason: Team-specific access pattern and AWS region. Not inferable. The NEVER rules could also become hooks.

sections.name: Internal Services
sections.reason: Team-specific URLs and service names. Not discoverable from code alone.

sections.name: Performance
sections.reason: Generic web performance advice the model already knows
